CentimetresConversionArea - Class in view
The conversion area for centimetres in the ConverterProject application.
CentimetresConversionArea() - Constructor for class view.CentimetresConversionArea
Creates a new CentimetresConversionArea with a yellow background and editable text.
centimetresConversionArea - Variable in class view.ConversionPanel
 
cm - Variable in class model.ValueToConvert
 
controller - package controller
 
conversionPanel - Variable in class controller.MenubarListener
 
ConversionPanel - Class in view
The main panel of the ConverterProject application, where the conversion area text boxes live.
ConversionPanel() - Constructor for class view.ConversionPanel
Creates a new panel containing three conversion areas: one for feet, one for metres, and one for centimetres.
convertCentimetresToFeet(double) - Static method in class model.Convertor
Converts centimetres to feet, assuming 1 cm = 0.03280839895 ft.
convertCentimetresToMetres(double) - Static method in class model.Convertor
Converts centimetres to metres, assuming 1 cm = 0.01 m.
Convertor - Class in model
A utility class for converting measurements to different units.
Convertor() - Constructor for class model.Convertor
 
createMenuItem(String, String, int, int, ActionListener) - Method in class view.MenuBar
Creates a new menu item for the menu bar.
